headlines.description: Tottenham Hotspur were held a scoreless draw at AFC Bournemouth, leaving the London club floundering midtable ahead of their derby match on Arsenal.

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL FCTV (Mourinho's Spurs 'absolutely awful' offensively) 2020/7/9 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs woeful in drab draw at Bournemouth

headlines.description: Everton's Brazilian forward Richarlison cancelled out Danny Ings's opener for Southampton as the teams drew 1-1 at Goodison Park.

video.headline: Richarlison helps Everton split points vs. Southampton

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL Highlight (Richarlison helps Everton split points vs. Southampton) 2020/7/9 AUS Only

headlines.shortLinkText: Ings nets again as Saints draw with Everton

headlines.description: Bruno Fernandes, Mason Greenwood, and Paul Pogba scored as Manchester United stayed in fine form and further dented Aston Villa's survival hopes.

video.headline: Nicol: Fernandes is carrying and lifting Pogba & Man United

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL FCTV (Nicol: Fernandes is carrying and lifting Pogba & Man United) 2020/7/9 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: Fernandes, Pogba propel Man Utd over Villa
